characters.name: Tomoya Aki
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Student / Executive producer / Director / Scenario writer / Manager

Tomoya is described as a 'hardcore geek'. However, he is one of the three most notable students at Toyogasaki Academy, along with [Utaha Kasumigaoka](https://anilist.co/character/88750/Utaha-Kasumigaoka) and [Eriri Spencer Sawamura](https://anilist.co/character/88749/Eriri-Spencer-Sawamura), due to his strong advocating of otaku culture at the school.

Tomoya is an otaku and prefers reading comics and light novels, watching anime, and playing visual novels above anything else. He is an enthusiastic fan of [Utaha](https://anilist.co/character/88750/Utaha-Kasumigaoka)'s novel Koisuru Metronome. He is the founder and representative member of Blessing Software, serving as the producer, director and programmer. He is also the manager of [Michiru](https://anilist.co/character/88752/Michiru-Hyoudou)'s cover band "Icy Tail". When motivated, especially by otaku-related factors, he can be shown to be very hardworking. After his encounter with [Megumi Kato](https://anilist.co/character/88748/Megumi-Katou), his strong desire to make his dream game drives him to take up several jobs for funding. He is extremely tenacious and would do anything to get what he wants, but is easily distracted. He was a typical consumer otaku who would spend the money at his part-time job on anime and games, but his money and time are later devoted to his own games. He is very friendly despite his eccentric personality, and he has a strong sense of morals and conviction when dealing with others.

characters.name: Megumi Katou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm (5'3")
__Occupation:__ Student / Assistant Director / Main Heroine

Megumi Kato is the classmate of [Tomoya Aki](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki), who is hardly noticed by others. After Tomoya had met her during the fate summons, she inspired him to make a dating sim game, featuring her as his Main Heroine. However, he is disappointed by her real personality. She is one of the main characters of the [Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata](https://anilist.co/anime/20657/Saenai-Heroine-no-Sodatekata/) series and is essentially the inspiration for the series title.

characters.name: Eriri Sawamura
alt_names: 澤村・スペンサー・英梨々
characters.description:
__Height:__ 158 cm (5’2”)
__Occupation:__ Student / Illustrator / Painter

Eriri Spencer Sawamura is [Tomoya](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki)'s childhood friend. She is a student of class 2G art club. She wears two hats as a student and a doujinshi artist. Eriri is one of the most beautiful girls to attend to Toyogasaki High School. Her family is very affluent. Her father is an English diplomat and she lives in a mansion. She is the secret illustrator for a famous doujinshi circle called ''Egoistic Lily'' under the alias Eri Kashiwagi when she participates in doujin activities. She was greatly influenced by her fujoshi mother and otaku father. She was the illustrator for Blessing Software.

characters.name: Utaha Kasumigaoka
characters.description:
__Height:__ 169 cm (5’6”)
__Occupation:__ Student / Author / Scenario Writer

Utaha Kasumigaoka is an up-and-coming young novelist and a student in class 3C who has a secret identity as a writer.

She is a hardworking girl who easily finishes writing their game's plot in the span of a night. Her usual disinterested expression gives off the impression that she is an unapproachable person. When she is with the people in [Tomoya Aki](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki)'s circle, she reverts to her disdainful self who enjoys making sarcastic remarks. She seems to be calm and quiet, but she actually has a sharp tongue. Utaha can be a little aggressive. Utaha is also very intelligent and is the smartest student in the school. She even writes plays for the drama club as a hobby. She is also a little bit self-centered, but she never talks back to her parents, making her well-mannered. However, when [Tomoya](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki) complimented her one time, she acted like a shy, embarrassed girl instead of her usual cold self and called [Tomoya](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki) by his first name instead of Rinri-kun.

characters.name: Michiru Hyoudou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 174cm (5'8")

Michiru Hyodo is [Tomoya Aki](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki)'s cousin/childhood friend (and by far his longest standing friend). She is a student in class 3, in the second year of Tsubaki Girls' Senior High School.

Michiru would have been a well-rounded student if not for her poor academic performance. She is fickle and naturally good at anything she does. [Tomoya Aki](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki) once noted that Michiru had a lot of useless talents. She is not interested in anything but her band and music, and enjoys playing the guitar. Michiru had a prejudice against otaku culture and wasn't happy about [Tomoya](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki) being an otaku and tried to get him out of his 'nerd phase' until Tokino Himekawa, Echika Mizuhara and Ranko Morioka (band members) told her they were all otaku. Michiru is a kind and caring girl, but she can also be childish sometimes and she also seems to be naturally cheerful as she is usually seen with a smile on her face. However, she also has shown to be serious and mature. It is hinted that she has feelings for [Tomoya](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki), though its not completely clear due to her slightly impassive personality.

characters.name: Izumi Hashima
characters.description:
__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")
__Occupation:__ Student / Illustrator

Izumi Hashima is a student in class 3A of Honoda Junior High School and a supporting-main character in the [Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata](https://anilist.co/anime/20657/Saenai-Heroine-no-Sodatekata/) series. She later attends the same high school as [Tomoya Aki](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki), the Toyogasaki High School.

When she was younger, Izumi used to be very outgoing and active and played with the boys. But after being introduced to the world of otaku by [Tomoya Aki](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki), she has become immersed in the fandom. Over all, Izumi has shown to very cheerful and glad, as she usually is seen with a smile on her lips. She usually is seen playing around, especially with [Tomoya](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki). Izumi is also very air-headed and childish and she rarely gives up on something that she really wants or likes. She has also shown to be quite matured.

characters.name: Keiichi Kato
characters.description: [Megumi Kato](https://anilist.co/character/88748/Megumi-Katou)'s Cousin. Keiichi is seen going to a café with Megumi Kato where [Tomoya Aki](https://anilist.co/character/88747/Tomoya-Aki) works, but Tomoya mistook Keiichi for Megumi's boyfriend. However, Megumi cleared the misunderstanding afterwards.

characters.name: Sonoko Machida
characters.description:
Sonoko Machida works at Fujikawa Shoten and is Utaha Kasumigaoka's editor.

She is a calm, collected and hardworking young woman who is also very mature but she acts childish at times.

characters.name: Iori Hashima
characters.description:
Iori Hashima is the older brother of Izumi Hashima, Tomoya Aki's former best friend and the previous representative of Rouge en rouge.

Iori is friendly at first, and despite being soft-spoken, he can be a little cold, and he dislikes being ignored. He can be kind as well as shown when he helped Tomoya Aki when he was in a tight spot.

characters.name: Ranko Morioka
characters.description:
Ranko Morioka is the oboist of the Icy tail band who is a is a casual otaku fan.

She is a quiet and calm girl who also seems to be experienced in Data Processing.

characters.name: Echika Mizuhara
characters.description:
Echika Mizuhara is another oboist of the Icy tail band who is a vocaloid addict.

She has shoulder-length purple hair that has a light purple colored hair band attached to her head and violet eyes.

characters.name: Tokino Himekawa
characters.description:
Tokino Himekawa is another oboist of the Icy tail band who is a voice actor fanatic.

She is a petite girl that has purple shoulder-length hair that curls at the tip. She has purple eyes. Tokino is usually seen with normal Tsubaki Girls Senior school uniform.
